remarks: Isomorphism H of lattice join of two atoms not under the fiducial hyperplane.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dihjatcc.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihjatcc.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihjatcc.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihjatcc.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihjatcc.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjatcc.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihjatcc.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjatcc.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihjatcc.p $e |- ( ph -> ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) $.
dihjatcc.q $e |- ( ph -> ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) $.
dihjatcc $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) = ( ( I ` P ) .(+) ( I ` Q ) ) ) $.
